articles.title: DPRK Permanent Representative at UN Sends Letter to UNSC President
articles.content:
DPRK Permanent Representative at UN Sends Letter to UNSC President
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The DPRK permanent representative at the UN sent a letter to the UN Security Council on Aug. 25.
					 The letter referred to the fact that the U.S. commenced the U.S.-south Korea Ulji Freedom Guardian 17 joint military exercises from the date of 21 August, 2017 in flagrant disregard of growing concerns and oppositions from the international communities, exposing the provocative and aggressive nature of the drills.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Waging such a provocative and aggressive joint military exercises in the Korean peninsula which has already turned into a tinderbox is nothing short of a hysteric conduct to add fuel to the raging flames.
					
					 The current situation testifies to the fact that the danger of nuclear war is created by the U.S. that doggedly pursues its evil intention of occupying the DPR Korea by force and that the U.S. is the harasser of peace.
					
					 Acknowledging that the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises constitute a grave threat to peace and security of the world as well as those of the Korean peninsula, the DPR Korea strongly requests the UNSC to discuss the issue of the joint military exercises as an emergency agenda item.
					
					 Should the UNSC ignore the request from the DPR Korea once again, it will become self-evident that the UNSC has ceased to remain as a body that assumes the primary responsibility for the maintenance of international peace and security, but been reduced into a marionette and a political instrument of the U.S.
					
					 Now that the U.S. has blatantly manifested its hostile intention towards the DPR Korea by waging aggressive joint military exercises despite the repeated warnings from the latter against its reckless behavior, the DPR Korea has every reason to respond with tough countermeasures as an exercise of its right to self-defense and the U.S. shall be held totally accountable for the catastrophic consequences to follow.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Moldova
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Moldova
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Igor Dodon, president of the Republic of Moldova, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in conformity with the aspiration and common interests of the peoples of the two countries and wished the president of Moldova great success in his responsible work.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Young Communist League of Korea
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Young Communist League of Korea
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- A national meeting for marking the 90th anniversary of the Young Communist League of Korea was held at the Central Youth Hall Sunday.
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, officials concerned and officials of youth league, youths and students.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, said that with a scientific insight into the requirements of the developing revolution, President Kim Il Sung founded the Young Communist League of Korea on August 28, Juche 16 (1927).
					
					 At a significant meeting of proclaiming the formation of the Juche-oriented youth organization, the President made a historical speech "On the Occasion of the Founding of the Young Communist League of Korea" in which he clearly indicated the nature and the fighting task of the league, thus providing a militant banner for effecting an epochal turn in developing the Korean revolution and the youth movement, the reporter said, and went on: 
					
					 With his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and energetic leadership, leader Kim Jong Il firmly defended the youth movement ideology and leadership exploits of the President and developed them in depth, thus opening up golden days of the Juche-oriented youth movement.
					
					 Kim Jong Il set August 28 as the Youth Day and provided energetic leadership so that the youth of the new generation would carry forward the cause of the Juche revolution that started on Mt Paektu, by inheriting the glorious history and tradition of the Korean youth movement.
					
					 The Korean youth movement that was pioneered and advanced along the path of victory by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il has greeted the days of fresh surge of its development thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The reporter called for waging  a more dynamic struggle for the final victory of the socialist cause of Juche, the steady strengthening and development of the glorious Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism youth movement and the bright future of the great Paektusan youth power under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying History and Tradition of Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth Movement
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying History and Tradition of Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth Movement 
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The Youth Day is the holiday of the young Korean people provided and brought into full bloom by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary holiday which demonstrates their patriotic loyalty and spirit to always march straight toward the final victory under the leadership of the Party, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an editorial.
					 The 90-year history of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist youth movement is a proud history which set an example in settling the issue of the youth thanks to the original idea of the great leaders and the great party on prioritizing the youth and to their leadership, and a glorious history in which a revolution advances and the dignity and honor of socialist Korea are exalted by the dynamic steps of the young Korean people, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung set forth the original idea on the position and role of the young people in the early period of the revolution and ushered in a true origin of the Korean youth movement.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il set the significant day in which the origin of the Korean youth movement was given as the Youth Day. This was a manifestation of the steadfast will to glorify the precious tradition of the Juche-oriented youth movement for all ages.
					
					 The present era is the glorious one in which the position and role of young people are increasing and the greatest heyday of the Juche-oriented youth movement is ushered in  thanks to the leadership of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Under the great programme for prioritizing the youth unfolded by Kim Jong Un, the whole country is vibrant with the spirit of youth and the spirit of the era such as the spirit of the Paektusan Hero Youth came into being and the brave unit for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche was brought up.
					
					 The young people can fulfill their mission before the era and the nation only under the care of the great leaders and the great party. This is the historic review of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist youth movement which has recorded victories and glory only.
					
					 The editorial calls for eternally glorifying the glorious history and tradition of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist youth movement rallied close around Kim Jong Un and carrying on the dynamic struggle for the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of building a socialist power.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Thoughtless Rhetoric about "Conditions for Dialogue" Slashed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Thoughtless Rhetoric about "Conditions for Dialogue" Slashed 
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean chief executive recently availed himself of various opportunities to spout the rubbish that "the north's suspension of additional nuclear and missile provocation should be a condition for dialogue" and "significant consideration will be taken of the dispatch of a special envoy" in case the suspension is put into practice.
					 Like master, like man, his inferiors are speaking public of "preconditions" while talking about "denuclearization through international pressure" and stressing that "resumption of dialogue depends on the change of the north's attitude".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary says in this regard:
					
					 Explicitly speaking, this is, in essence, nothing different from the "suspension of nuclear test, ballistic missile test-launch and provocative remarks" which the Trump group set as "three conditions" for DPRK-U.S. dialogue nor from the sophism of "the north's denuclearization first" clamored for by traitor Park Geun Hye.
					
					 The south Korean chief executive's recent remarks clearly prove the disposition and the mode of life of the present south Korean authorities which have taken over the baton of submission and servility toward the U.S. and confrontation with the fellow countrymen handed over by their predecessors.
					
					 What is more ridiculous is that the south Korean authorities are peddling even the story of "dispatch of a special envoy for the settlement of the north's nuclear issue", not content with setting it as the "conditions for dialogue" to "advance the settlement of the north's nuclear issue".
					
					 The nuclear issue is the one between the DPRK and the U.S. from every aspect and it can never see a solution as long as the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear blackmail and threat against the DPRK continue. This is well known by the world.
					
					 As had been clearly clarified, the DPRK's nuclear deterrence is not a bargaining chip to be put on a negotiating table. Particularly, such a thing as the discussion of the nuclear issue between the DPRK and the south Korean puppet forces will never happen.
					
					 The north-south dialogue will just turn out to be an outward show as long as the south Korean authorities do not adopt a proper stand toward the north-south relations.
					
					 Whether the north-south dialogue is resumed or not entirely depends on the south Korean authorities' attitude.

articles.title: DPRK Will Sharpen Its Just Nuclear Treasured Sword: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Sharpen Its Just Nuclear Treasured Sword: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun in an article Sunday ridicules the U.S. and its vassal forces for being flustered due to such pluck of the DPRK as reacting to the hard-line steps with the toughest ones.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The DPRK is showing no mercy, making the outrageous forces being at its beck and call with just nukes in order to have the country free from the nuclear threat.
					
					 Upset by the toughest will of the DPRK, the U.S. is talking not only about military counter-measures but also about what it calls "diplomatic settlement".
					
					 Trump, who said he would not "rule out war", suddenly made in official appearance the remarks that he will take into account "the negotiations with the north" and that there will be no one who wants peaceful settlement more than him.
					
					 The U.S. Secretary of State, the national security advisor to the President and other VIPs vied with each other in claiming that "the U.S. is willing to have negotiations with the north" and that "dialogue is also one of the proposals for settling the north's nuclear issue."
					
					 This is nothing but a revelation of the sinister intention to continue resorting to the moves for stifling the DPRK under the signboards of "dialogue", "negotiations" and "diplomatic settlement" so as to escape merciless punishment by the DPRK.
					
					 Such foolish attempt does not work on the DPRK.
					
					 If the U.S. persists in the reckless anti-DPRK moves, sanctions and pressure, it will eventually meet a miserable fate while spending hard time.
					
					 So long as the U.S. and its vassal forces persist with such actions and imperialism, the root cause of injustice and evils, remains, the DPRK will further sharpen its just nuclear treasured sword in its hand and defend independence and justice with nukes and usher in a new era of national prosperity with their might.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Calls for Investigating U.S., Manipulator of Kwangju Massacre
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Calls for Investigating U.S., Manipulator of Kwangju Massacre 
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- An editorial demanding investigation into the U.S. which connived at and manipulated the Kwangju massacre, was posted on the south Korean online paper Voice of People on Aug. 25. 
					 The editorial said that investigation took place several times to solve the past history issues of probing the truth behind the Kwangju massacre, but the most crucial item of the U.S. involvement has not been investigated properly.
					
					 It urged the regime to opt at once to probe the truth behind U.S.-led Kwangju massacre.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Slams U.S. Manipulation of Kwangju Massacres
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Slams U.S. Manipulation of Kwangju Massacres
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- A data was disclosed again that the U.S. manipulated the Chun Doo Hwan military fascist clique in mercilessly killing participants in the Kwangju Uprising, according to the south Korean online paper Voice of People on Aug. 24. 
					 As regards the Kwangju Uprising, such fact was disclosed through the document that officials of the U.S. Department of State made a report to its secretary on the items to be decided before the meeting for policy review at the White House on May 22, 1980. 
					
					 The report included that as south Korea twice asked the Combined Command to use the army for cracking down civilians, the command consented to do so.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations' Struggle against DPRK-targeted War Exercises Unabated
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations' Struggle against DPRK-targeted War Exercises Unabated
Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters for People's All-out Action and the People's Action for Peace against War in south Korea continued actions on August 25 protesting against the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises of the U.S. imperialists and the puppet warmongers, according to Jaju Sibo, south Korean internet newspaper. The organizations have staged actions in the vicinity of the U.S. embassy in Seoul since the first day of the exercises.
					The protestors marched to the area near Kwanghwamun after passing the embassy, demonstrating their will against the U.S. and war.
					
					Speakers at a rally held near the embassy denounced the joint military exercises based on OPLAN 5015 as provocative and bellicose drills. 
					
					They strongly demanded a stop to the exercises, saying that the people held the candlelight not only for the resignation of Park Geun Hye but for peace of the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Typhoid Patients Detected in S. Korea
articles.content:
Typhoid Patients Detected in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Typhoid patients occurred in south Korea recently, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 Typhoid bacillus was found among five university students who had been to India last July.

articles.title: Anti-U.S. Sacred War, Pro-Reunification Patriotic Movement, Called for
articles.content:
Anti-U.S. Sacred War, Pro-Reunification Patriotic Movement, Called for
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China on Aug. 25 made public a statement titled "We will wage a more vigorous struggle for uprooting the cause of war on the Korean peninsula, defending the dignity and sovereignty of the nation and ushering in a new era of peace and independent reunification of the country."
					 The statement demanded the U.S. and its vassal forces halt the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills at once, a prelude to north-targeted nuclear war.
					
					 It is high time that all Koreans turned out as one in the anti-U.S. sacred war to defend the security and peace of the nation with a high sense of being masters responsible for their own destinies and peace, it said, and went on:
					
					 The north-south relations fail to make an inch of advance but the military tension has reached the height on the Korean peninsula. This is attributable to the south Korean authorities' sycophancy and submission toward the U.S.
					
					 The members of the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China would turn out as one in the anti-U.S. sacred war and movement for reunification and patriotism, cherishing the truth that independence against the U.S. guarantees the nation's dignity and the improvement of the north-south relations and the nation's prosperity.

articles.title: Day of Songun Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Songun Celebrated in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Meetings, lectures and Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition took place in Switzerland, Bangladesh, Austria and Bulgaria from August 3 to 20 to mark the Day of Songun.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos showing the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed were their works, books introducing the DPRK, photos and handicraft showing the wisdom and talent of Koreans.
					
					 The chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee said that the DPRK could demonstrate its might as a world nuclear power and rocket power thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the Tangail Branch of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea said that Kim Jong Il developed the DPRK into a politico-ideological power united as one, raised the military capabilities of the country to the highest level and laid a firm foundation for building a powerful country with his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Members of the Youth Group for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism formed in Austria noted that the Songun revolutionary line put forward by Kim Jong Il serves as all-powerful treasured sword capable of smashing the war moves of the U.S. and other imperialists and reliably safeguarding the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the world peace and security.
					
					 The mayor of Sadobo City of Bulgaria and other figures said the realities in the DPRK vividly show that a small country can become a great one when led by a great leader, adding that it is the legitimate right of the DPRK to strengthen the self-defensive nuclear deterrent.
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Switzerland.

articles.title: Hungarian Party Paper Supports Cause of Korean People
articles.content:
Hungarian Party Paper Supports Cause of Korean People
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The paper of the Hungarian Workers' Party Szabadsag carried an article rejecting the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises and supporting the Korean people in their just cause on August 21.
					 The article fully disclosed the aggressive character and danger of the Ulji Freedom Guardian 17 which creates a gruesome war atmosphere and root cause and truth of the tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The DPRK built its own nuclear force undeterred by any pressure of the U.S. and its vassal forces.
					
					 It demonstrated its tremendous muscle of a socialist fortress by succeeding in the test-launch of ICBM.
					
					 The Hungarian Workers' Party will fully support the Korean people in their just cause, standing firm by their side.

articles.title: U.S. and Its Followers' Rubbish against DPRK Censured by Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
U.S. and Its Followers' Rubbish against DPRK Censured by Swiss Bodies
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on Aug. 20 made public a joint statement in support of the answers given by spokespersons of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK to questions put by KCNA over the fact that the secretary general of the United Nations, Australian authorities and U.S. vice-president spelled anti-DPRK remarks.
					 The statement said that recently the secretary general of the United Nations told a news conference that increasing tension on the Korean peninsula is attributable to the DPRK's "development of nukes and missiles", betraying he and the UNSC are the puppets of the U.S. The statement sniped at him for remaining dumb on the U.S. which is driving the situation on the peninsula into the worst phase.
					
					 The stand of the Australian authorities abetting the U.S. moves against the DPRK is aggravating the situation on the peninsula and encouraging Trump, trigger-happy man, to start a war of aggression against the DPRK, said the statement, adding:
					
					 The U.S. vice-president, while touring Chile, demanded Brazil, Mexico, Chile and Peru sever diplomatic ties with the DPRK. This is shameless interference in those countries' internal affairs and violation of their sovereignty. The U.S. purpose to isolate the DPRK can never come true.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena la "condicion del dialogo" de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena la "condicion del dialogo" de autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 27 de agosto (ACNC) -- En estos dias, el mandatario surcoreano dijo en varias ocasiones que el "cese de las adicionales provocaciones nucleares y coheteriles del Norte (de Corea)" es la "condicion de conversacion" y que si se logra eso "meditara suficientemente el mando del enviado extraordinario".
					Ademas, otras autoridades inferiores hablan a porfia de la "condicion premisa" pronunciando sobre la "desnuclearizacion mediante la presion internacional" y que "la reanudacion de conversacion depende del cambio de actitud del Norte".
					
					En el comentario individual del dia 27 el periodico Rodong Sinmun insistio en que tales peroraciones no tienen en su esencia ninguna diferencia con la "suspension de la prueba nuclear, el lanzamiento de prueba de cohete balistico y las palabras provocativas" presentada como las "tres condiciones" del dialogo EE.UU.-RPDC por la banda de Trump o con la sofisteria de la "desnuclearizacion, primero" de la traidora Park Geun-hye.
					
					Esto muestra claramente el atributo y limite innato de las autoridades surcoreanas actuales quienes sucedieron la tradicion del servilismo proyanqui, la dependencia y confrontacion fratricida de sus antecesores, senalo el diario y continuo:
					
					Lo mas ridiculo es que las autoridades surcoreanas difunden hasta el rumor del "mando del enviado especial por la solucion de asunto nuclear del Norte" al cabo de presentar el "avance de este asunto" como "condicion de conversacion".
					
					El problema nuclear es absolutamente el asunto entre EE.UU. y la RPDC y no se puede resolverse jamas mientras que se perdura la politica hostil anti- RPDC y el chantaje nuclear de EE.UU., lo cual esta reconocido por todo el mundo.
					
					Como ya hemos aclarado claramente, el disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC no es un objeto de regateo para cualquier dialogo o negociaciones. En particular, no tenemos necesidad de discutir este problema con los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Mientras que no se cambie la posicion fundamental de las autoridades surcoreanas con respecto a las relaciones Norte-Sur seran invalidas las conversaciones bilaterales.
					
					La perspectiva de las conversaciones N-S depende enteramente de la actitud de las autoridades surcoreanas.
